content.description:
A couple of crimps leads to the top. From a certain angle this corner of the rock looks like a face that’s been deconstructed.

sit start would be a bit more challenging
content.location: See picture, it’s the side with the perfect dirt path.

content.description:
Warm up slab on the Organ shaped rock, furthest East.

Easy feet and hands, get ya warmed up for all the other shorties in this lowball area. The backside has a shorter problem but a pg13ish drop.
content.location: See pic it’s a small area and easy to find.

content.description:
An angular spike of rock with many ways to climb it, fun movements but like all other problems here it is too short.

Start as low as you can to maximize the fun
content.location: It’s the eastern most boulder in this small crag. See picture you can’t miss it.

content.description: It starts with a large left crimp and right side pull on the lower boulder down under the slightly overhung north side of Organs and then wraps to the right or East. There is a large loose portion of the flake near the top out but it’s wedged in there pretty well. Once you transition from the lower section don’t dab ass or feet on the lower boulder.
content.location: Wrapping around the backside of organs without bodies.

content.description:
Long traverse linking A Petit Objet and Francis Bacon. A pumpy exercise that is really the best part of this area.

Can be climbed from the sit start and up to the right for the same difficulty v1-2ish.
content.location: Start same as Petit, end when you’re done looking like a hysteric clinging to a rock lip in some useless lowball crag.

content.description: The start to Discourse of the Hysteric. This is a good warm up climb with easy feet and fun right hand bumps around the dish. Squat or Sit start, like all the climbs here to maximize the length of the problem.
content.location: Next to Nagual see pics you can’t miss it
